name: Store (FellHawk)
description:
Store If you enjoy this project, please considering a dollar or two to help fund new developments!
 Any and all donations are welcome :)

A short graphics and mechanics demo

The main purpose of this project was to get my first original 3D game out there, I've worked with 3D a couple of times but I've never released any of the results.

The main challenge was figuring out what art style I want to do, balancing aesthetic with whats actually feasible for me to create (I'm not an artist). As you can see, the style is extremely simple and includes no textures. It's only 50mb!

Music by Giovanni "Gio" Moscato, made for this project!

Controls WASD - Movement Space - Jump Right Click (Tap) - Drop Right Click (Hold) - Throw This project is still in development. Planned features include:

* Controller support (limited support is currently available)

Criticism is greatly appreciated! Video playthroughs are also very welcome =)
